channel.title: Npc problem [pi]
channel.description:
so my friend was on helping me fix everything up and he was messing around and this kept happening [code][4/30/11 1:56 AM]: Players online: 1, engine load: 0.0% [4/30/11 1:56 AM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 [4/30/11 1:56 AM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.dropItems(NPCHandler.jav a:1790) [4/30/11 1:56 AM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java: 1531) [4/30/11 1:56 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:153) [4/30/11 1:56 AM]: A fatal exception has been thrown! [4/30/11 1:56 AM]: Saved game for jester. Press any key to continue . . .[/code]
Im looking at that line of code now but i've never messed with that class and i don't really know what to do so help pleas?
these are the two lines of code the problem is at i guess. [code] dropItems(i); // npc drops items!
Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, NPCDrops.rareDrops.get(npcs[i].npcType)[random][0], npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, NPCDrops.rareDrops.get(npcs[i].npcType)[random][1], c.playerId);[/code]

item.title: Npc problem [pi]
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

k will do but also it doesn’t happen all the time we killed the npc for a while and then i went to sleep and he kept on messing around and it happen 3 times he said it would happen on the last hit.

EDIT: ok so no problems adding the file but i will see if it happens anymore.

item.title: Npc problem [pi]
item.dc:creator: @deans1243 deans1243
item.description:
@deans1243 wrote:

so my friend was on helping me fix everything up and he was messing around and this kept happening

[4/30/11 1:56 AM]: Players online: 1, engine load: 0.0% [4/30/11 1:56 AM]: java.lang.ArrayIndexOutOfBoundsException: 0 [4/30/11 1:56 AM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.dropItems(NPCHandler.jav a:1790) [4/30/11 1:56 AM]: at server.model.npcs.NPCHandler.process(NPCHandler.java: 1531) [4/30/11 1:56 AM]: at server.Server.main(Server.java:153) [4/30/11 1:56 AM]: A fatal exception has been thrown! [4/30/11 1:56 AM]: Saved game for jester. Press any key to continue . . .

Im looking at that line of code now but i’ve never messed with that class and i don’t really know what to do so help pleas?

these are the two lines of code the problem is at i guess.

[code] dropItems(i); // npc drops items!

				Server.itemHandler.createGroundItem(c, NPCDrops.rareDrops.get(npcs[i].npcType)[random][0], npcs[i].absX, npcs[i].absY, NPCDrops.rareDrops.get(npcs[i].npcType)[random][1], c.playerId);[/code]
